title: working as Assistant Engineer in the Office of Ch
clause_text: working as Assistant Engineer in the Office of Ch.E.(D.P.) and ....................................., working as Assistant Engineer in the Office of Assistant Commissioner (Estates) / Ward for the said plot of the land have respectively handed over and taken over the possession of the above mentioned vacant land. The compound wall with gate wherever applicable is provided. The necessary provision of storm water drain is made.
section: No. Ch.E. /DP/ of FINAL POSSESSION RECEIPT
